belongs_to_collection.name: Honto ni Atta Kowai Hanashi Collection

original_title: ほんとうにあった怖い話 第二十八夜
overview: In addition to psychic images and psychic photos, the "curse video" coverage team established in 1999, the user's own psychic experience and consultation are received every day ... This series carefully selects the most terrifying anecdotes from a huge number of cases accumulated for more than 10 years, and sequentially reproduces them into videos.
title: Hontou ni Atta Kowai Hanashi: Dai Nijuuhachi Ya
